sentence: Rice also received a $5,000 check from Sen. Lisa Murkowski, the maximum-allowed contributed, and another $2,900 from Rep. Peter Meijer's respective political outfits, a sign that pro-impeachment lawmakers may try to stick together.
author: Brent D. Griffiths
title: Trump endorses primary challenger to GOP Rep. Tom Rice, continuing his effort to rid the party of anyone who supported his impeachment

author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Sen. Ron Johnson tops list of Republicans endorsed by top Jewish GOP organization
